Text: Tak i lewatu, e̩gba ki Jebin, onu Hazo̩r, gbʼinabah-wñ, i la fʼone̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Jobab onu Madon kpai tugbo onu Shimro̩n kpai tugbo onu Akshaf
kpai tugbo amonu ku ma jʼane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ kpai oj ane̩ uwo-wñ kpai efu Araba kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ Chine̩re̩t kpai ane̩ o̩go̩-wñ kpai otete Do̩r o̩wo̩ olane̩,
tugbo abo Kenan o̩wo̩ olodudu kpai o̩wo̩ olane̩ kpai abo Amo̩r kpai abo He̩t kpai abo Pe̩re̩z kpai abo Je̩bius oj ane̩ uwo le̩ kpai abo Hifai ku ma jo̩ e̩re̩ He̩rmo̩n oj ane̩ Mizpa.
Taku ma ledufu, ama kpai abogu-ma chaka, amone̩-wñ tabale, uwewe-ma la dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩lanyi ki dʼo̩la ohimini, ma nʼamanya kpai o̩ko̩ ogu otemeje.
Tak amonu le̩, chaka le dʼo̩la-ma, oñ ma lewa ru ugbokate, ugbo omi Me̩rom, ku ma kʼogu bʼabo Israe̩l.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, E̩ ki railo ma n, todu iko-i o̩na nakʼoku-ma jo̩ ñw abo Israe̩l: e̩ ki fʼilolo e̩re̩ amanya-ma ko̩da kʼe̩ la fʼo̩ko̩ ogu-ma gujo rinyo̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua kpai abo ogu chaka ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, lewa ugbo ma ugbo omi Me̩rom le̩ achigili, taku ma lewa abʼuma ma.

Oñ Jihofa mu ma ko nyʼabo Israe̩l o̩wo̩, taku ma gwo ma da, ma fu ma ne gbogbo wa Saido̩n elile le̩, gbogbo wa Misrefo̩t-maim, gbogbo wa o̩go̩ Mizpe o̩wo̩ olodudu; oñ ma gwo ma da gbogbo ma je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du bo̩ deju ge̩ n.
Jo̩shua la che ma alu ki Jihofa ka ñw u; i fʼilolo e̩re̩ amanya-ma ko̩da, oñ i fʼo̩ko̩ ogu-ma gujo rinyo̩.
Taku Jo̩shua mudabi tʼubi iko le̩, oñ i fu Hezo̩r du, i la nʼugbada kpa onu-wñ; todu Hezo̩r le̩ chʼoji ojane̩ ojane̩ o̩mo̩ chaka akwoubi.
Oñ ma nʼalu ugbada fʼamonugo one̩ chaka ku ma jʼefu-wñ gwo dajane̩, ma ko ma jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko; e̩ne̩ du bo̩ kʼi añmiñmi efu-ma n, oñ i nʼuna fu Hezor gujo rinyo̩.
Taku Jo̩shua mʼewo ewo amonu le̩ chaka kpai amonu-ma chaka ko oñ i nʼalu ugbada gwo ma da, i la mʼuma ko jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko, alu ki Mose̩s adu Jihofa le̩ ñwate̩.
Abo Israe̩l muda gu ewo okate ki dago oji otete ugbo ku ma ko unyi igbele, jo n, chai Hezo̩r kate; e-le̩ Jo̩shua fugujo.

Oñ abo Israe̩l mʼane̩ ewo ewo-i kʼogu le̩ je̩ du kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩-wñ ko chʼe̩wñ aluje̩ ñw o̩la-ma; ma muda nʼalu ugbada gwo amone̩-wñ du da, gbogbo taku ma fu ma kpa rinyo̩ kpa, ma la tʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi añmiñmi no̩ n.
Alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s, adu-wñ, alu le̩ Mose̩s ñwa ñwu Jo̩shua; abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua che; e̩wñ du ki Mose̩s ñwa ñw u i dʼokate-wñ tinyo̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua mʼane̩ le̩ chaka gba, tʼane̩ uwo-wñ, tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ chaka, tʼane̩ Goshe̩n le̩ chaka, tʼane̩ o̩go̩, tʼAraba, kpai ane̩ uwo e-Israe̩l kpai o̩go̩ ane̩ le̩ ge̩
akwo uwo Halak, kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ ate̩gu nyi Seir le̩, gbogbo wa Beal-gad ef o̩go̩ Lebanon e̩re̩ uwo He̩rmo̩n. Oñ i mʼamonu-ma chaka ko, i la fʼuma gwoda, oñ i fu ma kpa.
Jo̩shua la kʼogu bʼamonu le̩ gbane̩ gbane̩.
I nʼewo du kʼi chʼure̩do̩ kpai abo Israe̩l in, chai abo Hifai ku ma dodo Gibeo̩n; ogu le̩ fʼuma du chaka.
Todu Jihofa dʼe̩do̩ e̩gbiti ñwu ma, ku ma kʼogu wa bʼabo Israe̩l ma, kʼi mu ma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ne̩ du ki we eli ma eju, todu kʼi kpa ma rinyo̩, alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s le̩.

Taki Jo̩shua lewa iko le̩, oñ i fʼabo Anak ko̩da rinyo̩ bʼane̩ uwo kpai He̩bro̩n kpai Debir kpai Anab, te̩, kpai bʼane̩ uwo Juda chaka te̩, kpai bʼane̩ uwo e-Israe̩l te̩ chaka; Jo̩shua mʼama kpai ewo ewo-ma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko.
Abo Anak okate bo̩ oj ane̩ Israe̩l in; chai Gaza kpai Gat kpai Ashdo̩d, oñ ma bo̩bo̩ re.

Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua mʼo̩gbo̩ ane̩ le̩ chaka gba, likpa alu du ki Jihofa ko̩la ñwu Mose̩s; taku Jo̩shua mʼu ko chʼe̩wñ ogu ñw abo Israe̩l, likpa alu ku ma chʼe̩kpe̩ru ojoji ojoji o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma. Tak ane̩ le̩ bo̩ lii ñw ogu.
